page.title: 17RELIGION IN BUCKLAND NEWTON
page.content: Most people do not attend church services regularly. There are two churches in Buckland Newton. The church of the Holy Rood and the chapel at Duntish.The vicar of the parish church is responsible for the parishes of Glanvilles Wooton,Pulham, Longburton, Holnest as well as Buckland Newton.He not only takes the services;Communion and Matins,but also visits the sick and the elderly. Sometimes a lay preacher will take the Family Services. The popular seasons and services are Christmas,Easter and Harvest when thanks are given for the produce and the church is full.At the chapel there is a service which is followed by Sunday School.A different preacher takes the service each Sunday. Each year the chapel has a Harvest festival,Easter Service and a Carol Service.
